title: Vallejo Design System - Border Radius Tokens
description: Border radius values for consistent rounded corners, extracted from Figma Variables

200.name: Border Radius 200
200.usage: Standard border radius for buttons, inputs, cards

300.name: Border Radius 300
300.usage: Large border radius for cards, containers

small.name: Small
small.usage: Small border radius for badges, small elements

extraLarge.name: Extra Large
extraLarge.usage: Extra large border radius for hero sections, large containers

notes.extraction: Border radius tokens extracted from Figma Variables (size/border-radius/*)
notes.organization: Organized by numeric scale (200, 300) and semantic names (small, medium, large)
notes.cssVariables: All border radius values have corresponding CSS variables following the pattern: --border-radius-{value}
notes.usage: Use border radius tokens for consistent rounded corners. Prefer semantic names (small, medium, large) for clarity.
